#### `20d2196cfb250b3dc3c7532ab5170bef1b83c53642dbfcde0d14dce14f1ebdce`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

	done \

	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \

	&& ./configure \

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

			| sort -u \
	)" \

#### `355be5f9cf36b625f3658dd3e3cdb7a732decf5bca5ebf852a3daa404cd861a6`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

#### `2c117d615a3696f877bf1bb2c8913fc43b5cfe08838ebf4a7a4803b051bd87e3`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \

		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf

	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \

	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \

	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \

#### `33b724d66a16474cd0fa1778b94140398269e86b3b1d939e5079ef3a48a365a7`

```dockerfile
RUN set -ex \
	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \
		mkdir php-fpm.d; \
		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf
```

RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `ef022d44e9e86db56dc137f215f9d6242afb305a9afd84c5bcb58f759b7cd51f`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

#### `d60020f1088af916595aad8752121d5b41337ed7864b49db91defc9fab5cf2bf`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

-	Created: Fri, 29 Apr 2016 21:52:34 GMT
-	Parent Layer: `3fd8347342217ea2e4472cfdd2020bb1b54320cb642fd73372d2c7ab6cf199fd`

#### `d60020f1088af916595aad8752121d5b41337ed7864b49db91defc9fab5cf2bf`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `d60020f1088af916595aad8752121d5b41337ed7864b49db91defc9fab5cf2bf`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `8efabf5244a3e73133411f34f6ee1b28a8090bd6e75a2dbe2276352b69908dc6`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

#### `7f5ce33a4b661633628601dc8f4ff35f0a61778d8fe90e6767febc0afcd5853f`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \

		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \

			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf

#### `d736ec23a7cd38ce48f13cbbaa46986c0daf34d437e1c57ebe36654449c2fab9`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

```dockerfile
RUN set -ex \
	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \
		mkdir php-fpm.d; \
		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf
```

	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		curl-dev \

		sqlite-dev \

	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

#### `ccca089f794baa4abab988bd25c910e5357aa2e58d13a70ccc18b01994a334a6`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

#### `dced883d18e7928955ff996e852f7aa7d994dc3445d22747381bd4e38a376af3`

```dockerfile
RUN set -ex \
	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \
		mkdir php-fpm.d; \
		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf
```

	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \

			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps

		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \

		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf

#### `6b9c56bb6d4350bf7bc313ff1c70918f26ec0251d62d0f1281fb4cbd2b1b3313`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `ab6006b201252bdb18f74abd7926eaecf03bf8c4342711aae43c6f92241ab3bf`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

#### `ab6006b201252bdb18f74abd7926eaecf03bf8c4342711aae43c6f92241ab3bf`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

#### `2f19025282bcc38750006334a0058fe9feaa920b7c80606ecd93e06daff781f5`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `814bff28fbfa9ea112230115ca983fd6754990773651dfe966abbca9fcbe8f9f`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `56022b80b9681a218bd8115c1bf6116c283c9238e05ae86b68f6bd2a6b41c18b`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `dd6130172c2087f23b8c0002f16439dd8f09bde046df5c5295a6faa607415194`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

```dockerfile
RUN set -ex \
	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \
		mkdir php-fpm.d; \
		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf
```

#### `dd6130172c2087f23b8c0002f16439dd8f09bde046df5c5295a6faa607415194`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `7350ccdf85a7d97bc91aaef97d19f15c6286de97d102c9a76b88271f761b70af`

```dockerfile
RUN set -ex \
	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \
		mkdir php-fpm.d; \
		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf
```

RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \

		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `7f76a6d3ed979a7f3ebebe59dc70a16bb6408a861df99a936f0bc10c7e44c9c9`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

```dockerfile
RUN set -ex \
	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \
		mkdir php-fpm.d; \
		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf
```

	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \

	fi \

		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf

	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \

	&& runDeps="$( \

			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \

#### `7f76a6d3ed979a7f3ebebe59dc70a16bb6408a861df99a936f0bc10c7e44c9c9`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf

	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \

		libssl-dev \

	" \

	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps

#### `bd4ad6284ddf97ae55ae8aab823428b465a5c34bc96bceaf0da4dcf29d12e8b6`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

#### `bd4ad6284ddf97ae55ae8aab823428b465a5c34bc96bceaf0da4dcf29d12e8b6`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```
